# [Interview #1130: MiniCon 2015, Entry #10](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1130#10)

#### Ruro272

Was Adolin's murder of Sadeas him falling under the influence of Odium, or was that all him?

#### Brandon Sanderson

That was all Adolin.
